text: BPR may refer to: *Business process reengineering *Belarusian People's Republic *BPR Global GT Series, an international sports car racing series from the mid-1990s *Bypass ratio of a turbofan engine *Banque Populaire du Rwanda, bank *BPR News, named for the parent company Blue Ridge Public Radio of radio station WCQS in Asheville, North Carolina, United States
title: BPR
